text: Sempiternal is the fourth studio album by Bring Me the Horizon. Bring Me the Horizon is a British rock band. The band released the album on 1 April 2013. In the United States and Canada, they released it on 2 April 2013. Epitaph Records and RCA Records released it. The album has four singles. These are "Shadow Moses", "Sleepwalking", "Go to Hell, for Heaven's Sake" and "Can You Feel My Heart". The album was number 3 on the UK Albums Chart. It was number one on the ARIA Charts in Australia. The RIAA gave the album a gold certification in 2016. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:RCA Records albums
title: Sempiternal
